nodes.text: Sometime between 3973 BBY and 3965 BBY, during the early years of the conflict known as the Mandalorian Wars, the Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders raided the Dennogra system, a star system in Hutt Space.
The battle is only referenced once in 2009's The Essential Atlas. It is marked on a galactic map showing the battles of the Mandalorian Wars rather than described in prose.
